articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chairman of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chairman of Intl Kim Il Sung Foundation
Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Chairman of the International 
					Kim Il Sung Foundation Johnny Hon at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					The chairman said while staying in the DPRK he witnessed its people achieving great successes in socialist construction, foiling the imperialists' obstructions under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that the foundation going by the august name of President Kim Il Sung would make a positive contribution to the Korean people's building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Chinese Beijing Gov. Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Beijing Gov. Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the People's Government of Beijing Municipality of China led by Vice Mayor Huang Wei arrived here Friday.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has brought out new stamps (four kinds of sheetlets and a souvenir sheet) to mark this year, named Year of the World Red Cross and Red Crescent and International Year of Astronomy.
					 Printed on the top of the sheetlets and sheet are words "Year of the World Red Cross and Red Crescent" or "International Year of Astronomy 2009" in Korean and English.
					
					 Contained in a sheetlet are stamps portraying a young Swiss man, Henry Dunant, who initiated humanitarian relief activities in the Solferino battlefield of Italy in June 1859, and showing first-aid treatment and activities for preventing damage from natural disasters.
					
					 Seen in others are the galactic system, a total solar eclipse observed in the whole world and a partial eclipse in Pyongyang on the 22nd of last July, astronomical relics and remains in Korea including Chomsongdae (astronomical observatory) and the like.

articles.title: Ideological Weapon of Korean People
articles.content:
Ideological Weapon of Korean People
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now striving hard to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation, giving a full display to the spirit of self-reliance and hard working.
					 This spirit is the powerful ideological and moral weapon of the Korean people, who have covered the road of victory and glory under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Since the torch of a new great revolutionary upsurge of the Songun era was kindled the Korean people have fully demonstrated what miracles and feats the owners of this spirit can perform on all fronts of the building of such a country.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has led the people to the victory through his tireless field guidance to all sectors.
					
					 His faith in independence, self-confidence and perseverant spirit of forced march have served as the motive force of further boosting the people's revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					  With the conviction of sure victory and a firm belief that their style is the best and their strength is the greatest, the Korean people could make a UHP electric arc furnace, called the cream of the modern metallurgical industry, by their own efforts and succeed in launching the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					
					 The great changes made in the present era of a great upsurge are miracles of history which can be wrought only in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the homeland of the Juche idea and a powerful nation of self-reliance.
					
					 The Korean people have still suffered from different shortages in their efforts for finally building a thriving nation.
					
					 However, there is nothing impossible for the Korean people, who, closely united around the WPK, have an indomitable spirit, a superior socialist system and a solid foundation of self-reliant economy consolidated in trying ordeals.
					
					 It is thanks to the spirit of self-reliance and hard working that they have established the Korean-style production system based on domestic raw materials and resources, introduced the Juche-oriented up-to-date technologies and built monumental edifices with an indefatigable will and strenuous efforts.
					
					 The Korean people are convinced that only in the spirit of self-reliance and hard working, can they emerge victorious and usher in the future of a powerful nation.

articles.title: Adherence to Three Principles of Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Three Principles of Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- The three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- set forth and consistently maintained by the Workers' Party of Korea are unchangeable principles of national reunification. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a signed article carried in this regard:
					
					 These principles serve as the most just reunification programme and a charter for reunification common to the nation as they call for independently solving the issue of national reunification on the principle of national self-determination free from outside interference, reunifying the country by peaceful means without resorting to the use of armed forces and promoting the great unity of the whole nation irrespective of ideology, ism and system. 
					
					 The issue of national reunification should be solved strictly on the three principles no matter how the situation and environment may change in the future.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, thoroughly embody the three principles of national reunification and clearly indicate the way of solving the issues of the inter-Korean relations and the reunification on those principles.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly wish the improved inter-Korean relations and peace and reunification, they should respect the said declarations and clarify their will to implement them.
					
					 Absolutely intolerable are treacherous and anti-reunification acts such as violating the spirit of the inter-Korean declarations and standing in the way of their implementation.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should never tolerate any anti- reunification act of negating the inter-Korean declarations and obstructing their implementation but decisively foil them by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 The DPRK will as ever firmly abide by the above-said three principles in the struggle for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Masses Termed Engine Steering Development of History
articles.content:
Masses Termed Engine Steering Development of History
Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made a scientific clarification of the characteristics of the present times that the popular masses are steering the development of history, powerfully promoting the development of human history. This is an immortal exploit he has performed for the accomplishment of the cause of global independence. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					 The orientation of the development of history is defined by the desire of the popular masses, the driving force of history, for independence and their struggle for translating it into a reality, the article notes, adding that this is clearly proved by the people's ever-mounting worldwide struggle against all forms of domination, subjugation, aggression and war.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Independence is the main trend of the development of history in the present times and it is Songun which gives an impetus to this trend.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's unique Songun politics has firmly grasped the hearts of hundreds of millions of people as it is universally recognized as the most effective political mode in the present times.
					
					 The great Songun idea has been widely disseminated worldwide as the pronoun of justice and truth, banner of independence against imperialism and a symbol of victory.
					
					 The Songun politics, an all-powerful treasured sword and banner of all victories, instills strong energy and courage into the progressive people while frustrating the imperialists' ambition for domination and policies of aggression, thus giving rise to the wave of struggle for independence in the world.
					
					 No force on earth can stem the trend of the historical development in the present times toward independence and Songun.
					
					 Unexpected complicated developments took place in various regions as evidenced by the collapse of socialism in some countries. This was nothing but temporary and abnormal ones that happened in the course of humankind's advance toward an independent new world.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Day Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in the Czech Republic and a round-table talk in Austria on Nov. 26 and 28 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of Kim Jong Il and photos of the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that the progressive humankind is recollecting the unique Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the significant day. The Songun politics is the politics giving hope and confidence to all the people, he added.
					
					 Oliver Jonischkeit, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, noted that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the army and people of the DPRK have firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and developed socialism while foiling the moves of the U.S. and other imperialist forces.
					
					 This encourages the progressive trade unions the world over struggling for the interests of the working class, he said.
					
					 Saying that Kim Jong Suk's noble exploits for the cause of the Korean revolution will remain forever, he expressed support for all the measures taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Johnny Hon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Johnny Hon
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 4 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae en un ambiente amistoso con Johnny Hon, presidente de la "Fundacion Internacional Kim Il Sung", de visita en Corea. 
					En la ocasion, el visitante se refirio a que durante su permanencia aqui, presencio los grandes exitos que bajo la sabia direccion del gran camarada Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano logra en la construccion del socialismo frustrando las maniobras de estorbo de los imperialistas.
					
					Destaco que la "Fundacion Internacional", que tiene el nombre del gran Presidente Kim Il Sung, hara un gran aporte a la construccion de una gran potencia prospera del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos
articles.content:
Emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que el presente es el ano mundial de la cruz roja y medialuna roja y astronomia, quedaron emitidos en Corea nuevos sellos (4 papeles enterizos y uno de pequeno tamano).
					En la parte superior de ellos se leen las frases "Ano de cruz roja y medialuna roja mundiales" y "2009, ano internacional de astronomia" escritas en coreano e ingles.
					
					El papel enterizo dedicado al ano de cruz roja y medialuna roja mundiales se compone de los sellos que muestran al entonces joven suizo Henry Dunant, quien tomo la iniciativa del socorro humanitario en el campo de batalla de Solferino de Italia en junio de 1859, y las actividades de primeros auxilios y frente a los desastres naturales.
					
					Los restantes dedicados al ano internacional de astronomia conllevan los sellos que describen la galaxia, el eclipse total ocurrido el pasado 22 de julio en el ambito mundial y el parcial acontecido en Pyongyang, el Observatorio Chomsongdae y otras ruinas y reliquias historicas de la astronomia de Corea, etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere a principios de reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere a principios de reunificación
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los tres principios de la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional son los invariables para la reintegracion territorial de la patria, presentados y mantenidos constantemente por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Destaca así el diario Rodong Sinmun en un artículo individual publicado en su edicion de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					Los tres principios de la reunificacion de la patria abogan por resolver el problema de reunificacion de manera independiente, o sea, sin permitir la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas basandose en el principio de autodeterminacion nacional, alcanzar la reunificacion por vía pacífica sin recurrir al uso de las fuerzas armadas y promover la gran unidad pannacional por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, ideales y regímenes. Esos principios constituyen el programa mas justo y la carta comun de la nacion para lograr la reintegracion territorial de la patria.
					
					Sean cuales fueran las circunstancias y las atmosferas, la reunificacion de nuestro pais debe ser alcanzada a base de los tres principios de la independencia, la reunificacion pacífica y la gran unidad nacional.
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera, materializan estrictamente los tres principios e iluminan claramente la via de la solucion del problema de las relaciones Norte-Sur y el de reunificacion a base de esos documentos.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, la paz y la reunificacion, deben respetar las declaraciones mencionadas y expresar claramente su voluntad de ejecutarlas.
					
					Nunca pueden ser tolerados los actos antinacionales y anti-reunificacion como pisotear el espiritu de las declaraciones Norte-Sur e impedir su ejecucion.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais no deben perdonar ni en lo mínimo los actos anti-reunificacion, que niegan dichas declaraciones e impiden su ejecucion, sino frustrarlos tajantemente con las fuerzas unidas.
					
					En lo adelante tambien, la RPDC mantendra invariable y firmemente estos tres principios en la lucha por la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y por la reintegracion territorial de la patria.

articles.title: Masas populares son promotoras del desarrollo de la historia
articles.content:
Masas populares son promotoras del desarrollo de la historia
Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este viernes un artículo individual cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					Al evaluar científicamente las características de la epoca actual, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il afirmo que las masas populares encauzan el desarrollo de la historia.
					
					De esta manera, dio buen impulso a la evolucion de la historia de la humanidad realizando así inmortal hazana para el cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia en todo el mundo.
					
					El rumbo del desarrollo de la historia se fija segun la aspiracion independiente de las masas populares, que son sujeto de la historia, y la lucha de ellas por llevarla a la realidad.
					
					Lo demuestra el hecho de que se intensifica cada día mas en la palestra mundial la lucha de los pueblos contra la dominacion, la subyugacion, la agresion y la guerra de todo tipo.
					
					En la epoca actual, la independencia es la corriente principal del desarrollo de la historia y el Songun es el promotor de la misma.
					
					La original política de Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, reconocida por todo el mundo como modo político mas poderoso en la epoca actual, se arraiga profundamente en los corazones de cientos de millones de habitantes del planeta.
					
					La gran idea del Songun se difunde ampliamente en todo el mundo siendo pronombre de la justicia y la verdad, bandera de la independencia antiimperialista y simbolo de la victoria.
					
					La política de Songun, remedio omnipotente y bandera de victorias, redobla la fuerza y el coraje de los pueblos progresistas y levanta el fuerte oleaje de independencia en el mundo frustrando la ambicion dominacionista y la politica agresiva de los imperialistas.
					
					No se puede bloquear por nada la corriente de la historia de la epoca actual hacia la independencia y el Songun.
					
					Si bien en algunos países resulto frustrado el socialismo y en varias regiones sucedieron acontecimientos complicados, pero, esto no pasa de ser una situacion temporal y anormal dada en el curso de avance de la humanidad hacia un nuevo mundo independiente.
